concept: Nosferatu street hustler and information broker who runs scams, sells gossip, and keeps the pulse of the streets.
biography: Before her Embrace, Violet was a small-time grifter running cons in alleys and backstreets. Her sharp tongue and fearless attitude caught the attention of a Nosferatu who saw potential in her survival instincts. Fifteen years later, she has turned those same hustler skills into a thriving network of informants across the city. Her lair lies beneath an abandoned subway line, furnished with scavenged comforts and monitored by hidden cameras. Violet trades information for favors, protects her street people like a wary aunt, and never lights the cigarettes she carries. She has a soft spot for addicts and runaways, though she refuses to feed on them. To the Kindred of the city, Violet is a gossip, a survivor, and an unpredictable wildcard whose knowledge can make or break reputations.
equipment: Worn backpack with notebooks, cheap burner phone, coin deck, switchblade, lighters, scavenged solar lanterns, hidden surveillance cameras in her haven.

powers.power: Whispers to the Wild (rats and vermin)

backgroundDetails.Resources: Lives on scavenged and hustled income; minimal comforts.
backgroundDetails.Contacts: A crooked beat cop, a paramedic, and a pawnshop owner feed her street intel.
backgroundDetails.Allies: A Nosferatu 'nephew' named Buster handles her errands and protection during daylight.
backgroundDetails.Influence: Strong grip on the street network — addicts, hustlers, and runaways all owe her small favors.
backgroundDetails.Status: Recognized as a valuable if rough-edged information source within the Nosferatu network.

merits_flaws.name: Iron Will
merits_flaws.description: She cannot be easily manipulated or dominated; her survival instinct is unbreakable.

merits_flaws.name: Prey Exclusion (Addicts)
merits_flaws.description: Refuses to feed on addicts due to guilt and empathy from her mortal past.

merits_flaws.name: Eerie Presence
merits_flaws.description: Mortals instinctively find her unsettling, even when she tries to charm them.

status.notes: Information broker, comic relief with bite. Prefers neonates to elders. Smokes unlit cigarettes. Always running a side hustle — sometimes for the Nosferatu Primogen, sometimes for herself.

research_notes.npc_role: Serves as a street-level contact for the coterie or Primogen. May introduce rumors about the new Kindred at the next gathering.
story_hooks: Her rat messenger 'Mr. Buttons' goes missing after seeing something in Elysium.
She tries to sell a flash drive of secret Nosferatu surveillance footage — unaware it’s hexed.
She owes a ghoul from another clan money after protecting a mortal debtor.
